channel.title: Abouts on Development from "Scratch"
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Development from "Scratch"

item.title: About
item.description: Introduction Link to heading Welcome to my page. How you got here I have no clue but I hope it can be of service to you in some way. My goal for this page is to discuss some concepts that I think are of value. Short and sweet posts that expand or introduce you to topics that I stumbled on. After some time I’ve learned to avoid some websites like medium since they end up beating some topics to death.
